english: The appeal was adjourned for affidavits to be obtained
chinese: 为获得宣誓书，上诉被推迟。

english: Estate duty affidavits statements in lieu of affidavit
chinese: 呈报遗产宣誓书或遗产简易呈报表

english: An affidavit that attests to the truth of a pleading
chinese: 宣誓供词证明某一申诉属实的宣誓书

english: The lawyer invited his client to subscribe the affidavit
chinese: 律师请他的客户在宣誓书上签了名。

english: The lawyer invited his client to subscribe the affidavit
chinese: 律师请他的当事人在宣誓书上签了名。
宣誓书造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: A faxed copy of the notarized consent form is acceptable
chinese: 我们接受经公证核实的同意宣誓书传真本。

english: An original oath executed by the inventor
A certification on an affidavit declaring when , where , and before whom it was sworn
chinese: 宣誓证明附在宣誓书上的证明，声明何时、何地、在何人监誓下进行宣誓

english: Declaration from solicitor of the change of name , photocopy of the declaration must be attached
chinese: 如属更改姓名，必须夹附由律师发给的更改姓名宣誓书及其影印本。

english: Declaration from solicitor of the change of name , photocopy of the declaration must be attached
chinese: 如属更改姓名，必须夹附由律师发给的更改姓名宣誓书及其影印本。

english: Menton . john henry , solicitor , commissioner for oaths and affidavits . dignam used to be in his office
chinese: 姓门顿，名叫约翰亨利，是个律师，经管宣誓书和录口供的专员。

english: Affidavit for the commissioner - when applying for subsequent grant duty having being paid
chinese: 呈报遗产宣誓书供申请发给承办遗产的后期许可证而遗产税经已缴妥的情况下用

english: In the case of a change in the name , declaration from a solicitor , photocopy of the declaration must be attached
chinese: 如属更改姓名，必须提交由律师发给的更改姓名宣誓书及其影印本。

english: But an affidavit filed by eastern health as a response to the lawsuit shows the error rate is actually much higher
chinese: 但在东部卫生组织回应这场官司的宣誓书中，误差率实际上远远高于预期。
